Subject: Issue with Marketing Campaigns

The marketing campaigns are not achieving the expected engagement levels. The problem seems to be related to platform consistency and technical malfunctions My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Despite restarting devices and checking network connections, the issue persists You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. We appreciate your support in solving the issue as soon as possible.
